dataLink.name: DCPP prescribed sea surface temperature (SST) patterns: AMV SST data, PDV SST data and Pacemaker SST data.

availability.description: DCPP prescribed sea surface temperature (SST) patterns: AMV SST data, PDV SST data and Pacemaker SST data.
availability.name: DCPP prescribed sea surface temperature (SST) patterns: AMV SST data, PDV SST data and Pacemaker SST data.

description: Alter surface fluxes to impose model climatology plus negative Pacific Decadal Variability (PDV) anomalies of Sea Surface Temperature (SST) over the northern extra-tropical Pacific (10N-65N).    Idealised PDV anomalies of SST will be provided by DCPP.  For groups that are unable to restore SSTs.
name: Impose SST PDV neg NexTrop Pacific
rationale: To investigate the climate impacts of negative Pacific Decadal Variability (PDV) anomalies.
longName: Impose negative PDV anomaly to sea surface temperatures in the northern extra-tropical Pacific
keywords: DCPP, SST, imposed, PDV-, negative PDV, negative Pacific Decadal Variability anomaly, northern extra-tropical Pacific
